title: PBE
body: how can i make a PBE acount ???

replies.body:
You can apply for PBE access using the [**signup page**](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe). For more information on how the PBE system works and how we pick testers, check our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) out.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
